name: Bubble Shooter (Watch & Phone)
description:
A great game for you to enjoy on your Apple Watch or your iPhone/iPad:

How to play:
- Match 3 or more bubble to make them burst.
- Tap to shoot a bubble.
- Drag your finger (or use Digital Crown) to aim , release to shoot.

3 game modes:
- Classic: after 3 faults (shooting without making bubble explode) a new row will appear.
- Challenge: every 5s a new row will appear, you must play like crazy.
- Impossible: just impossible, try your best!

*** GET IT NOW ***
